name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil leaves, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil.

name: Spicy Chicken Tacos
description: Three tacos filled with grilled spicy chicken, topped with fresh pico de gallo, shredded lettuce, and a zesty lime crema.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A hearty burger made with a black bean and quinoa patty, served with avocado, lettuce, tomato, and a chipotle aioli on a whole-grain bun.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich and decadent dessert featuring a warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing, topped with croutons, shaved Parmesan cheese, and grilled chicken.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon filet grilled to perfection, served with a side of steamed vegetables and a lemon butter sauce.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of foam.
